suite.name: TestesUsuarios POST

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=http://localhost:3000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{payload} = { nome=Lana Del Rey | email=stargirlinterlude@gmail.com | password=ultraviolence | administrador=true }

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3000/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '95', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'} body=nome=Lana+Del+Rey&email=stargirlinterlude%40gmail.com&password=ultraviolence&administrador=true

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Should Match
kw.doc: Fails if the given ``string`` does not match the given ``pattern``.
